typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcSTGNTR
SrcSTGNTR unpivot(output(
		Variables as string,
		Answer_KEY as string
	),
	ungroupBy(ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		A01,
		A02,
		A03,
		A04,
		A06,
		A07,
		A09,
		A10,
		A11,
		A12,
		A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(input(
		{ProjectID|Context|FirmID|Date of data collection|Country|interviewkey|interviewid|A01|A02|A03|A04|A06|A07|A09|A10|A11|A12|A13|B01|B03|B17|BA03|BA04|BA07|BA08|BA11|BA12|BA13|BA14|BA15|BB02|BB08|BB09|BC03|BC04|C04|C05|DA01|DB01|DB02|DB03|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NTF_UNPOVITE.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TrgUnpovitNTR
